title: Can't unlock skin from loot
body: I recently unlocked the skin "Unmasked Kayle" from an Orb of Chaos. The vs. event hasn't ended yet and I Can't unlock the skin. It simply only gives me the option to re-roll or disenchant. I own Kayle and have enough orange essence. I don't know why this is happening. any help?

replies.body: That is an awesome skin, congrats!!  That's really strange, though, I'm curious why that's happening.  When you get a chance, toss me a screenshot of the options you're seeing and the shard itself.  I'd like to get some more info and take it from there, let me know!
